output:
And when it wakes up, it will become something entirely new.
We're in a time of throwaway technology.
I'll give you 30, 40, 50, and then it's in.
Only some of the stuff that gets thrown away isn't dead.
Well?
Merry Christmas, baby. I got something else you'd like.
What is it?
It's asleep.
Fair Isle Electronics presents its new model, the Mark 13.
Mark 13 is self-repairing, capable of recharging its storage batteries from just about any power grid, including this one.
